name: HeroOverlay
description: Full-screen hero section with background image/video overlay, circular blur effect, and configurable text positioning (center or bottom-left).

description.example: Create stunning, responsive websites with our comprehensive component library

imageSrc.note: Background image that fills the viewport. Supports external URLs with unoptimized prop

videoSrc.note: Background video that fills the viewport. Takes precedence over imageSrc if both provided

imageAlt.note: Empty string marks image as decorative (aria-hidden)

textPosition.note: 'center' positions text in the center of viewport, 'bottom-left' positions text at bottom-left corner

showBlur.note: Controls circular blur effect with radial gradient. Blur follows text position (centered or bottom-left corner)

showDimOverlay.note: Adds semi-transparent dark overlay (bg-background/20) over background media for improved text contrast

structure.href: string - Link destination (optional). External URLs (https://, http://, www.) open in new tab. Internal values (e.g., 'about', 'contact') scroll to #about, #contact sections
structure.props: Partial<ButtonPropsForVariant> - Additional button props like className, textClassName (optional)

buttonRules.note: Button variant is controlled by ThemeProvider's defaultButtonVariant. Border radius is controlled by ThemeProvider's borderRadius (options: 'sharp', 'rounded', 'soft', 'pill'). All sections should be wrapped in a single ThemeProvider at the app/page level to maintain consistent styling across the entire site.

propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>

usageExample:
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="hover-bubble" defaultTextAnimation="entrance-slide" borderRadius="pill">
  <HeroOverlay 
    title="Build Modern Web Experiences" 
    description="Create stunning, responsive websites with our comprehensive component library" 
    tag="New Release" 
    imageSrc="/hero-background.jpg" 
    imageAlt="Hero background"
    textPosition="bottom-left"
    showBlur={true}
    showDimOverlay={false}
    buttons={[{ text: 'Get Started', href: 'https://example.com' }, { text: 'Learn More', href: 'about' }]} 
  />
</ThemeProvider>
